title: NCSU OLE Ingest Toolkit Bibliographic Record

___created_by.description: ID or initials of the user who created the record

___status.description: name?  id? of last cataloguing status

___bib_id.description: The ID generally used to refer to the record

___status_updated_by.description: Identifier for last user to update the cataloguing status of the record

___content.description: MARCXML serialization of the bibliographic record

___updated_by.description: Identifier for the last user who altered the record

___former_id.description: An identifier for the record from an previous system

___fast_add.description: Was the record added at a circulation desk?

___unique_id_prefix.description: prefix for record type that will be added to bib_id property to identify the object in OLE's Solr index

___status_updated_date.description: timestamp of status update for this record

___date_created.description: Timestamp record was originally created (ISO-8601 format)

___staff_only.description: Is the record restricted for viewing to just staff?
